_header: Of the holy homilies now I will blin
_description: Introductory couplet to a Middle English devotional prose tract

CamMagPep2498.Transcription:
Of þe holy omelies now I wil blynneGod bring vs to þat
                    blisse þere ioye is euere Inne
CamMagPep2498.Note:
As heading to ‘Here bigynnen good techinges of wise men wiþ
                    þe ten hestes afterward’ (p. 212b).
CamMagPep2498.Editions:
Påhlsson,  Joel,
                        ed.  
             The Recluse: a Fourteenth Century Version of the Ancren Riwle.
         Lund: Ohlsson, 1911: iv.
